name: Grandfathers Book
description:
You have just gotten an old book that your grandfather had before he died.

You read a bit in it before you go to bed, and wakes up in another place?

What is the history behind Grandfathers book?

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Short horror game made in 24 hours

Install instructions:

1. Download the game zip file

2. Right click zip file and  extract all

3. Run the Grandfathers Book.exe by double clicking
